title: Scheduled Changes to Ranked Queues in OCE
body:
Hi Everyone,

As we mentioned in our "[Preseason Ranked Queue Testing](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/aAfOmVeI-oce-preseason-ranked-queue-testing-updated-nov-18th)" announcement, the enable times of Ranked Solo and Flex queues were subject to change once we understood how players would handle dual-wielding ranked modes.  We've now had some time to analyse the performance of these queues around queue health (queue times and matchmaking quality).

It's taken us a little longer than we'd have liked to adjust the queues—due to bugs occurring with Ranked Flex immediately after launch—but we've now gathered and analysed enough data on both queues' performance to decide on how best to proceed.

For most of the day, both SR Ranked queues are healthy with fairly even sized player-bases. However, certain hours of the day have significantly fewer players online. During these times, both queues occasionally have issues maintaining high-quality matchmaking or queue times.  

Rather than disabling both queues during these hours, we're going to see how they perform when only one queue is available during this time of day.

The following changes will be implemented early December 2nd:

* SR Ranked Solo/Duo will be disabled daily during the hours of 04:00 AM to 07:00 AM AEDT (Disabled for 3 hours)
* SR Ranked Flex will be disabled daily during the hours of 07:00 AM to 10:00 AM AEDT (Disabled for 3 hours)

----------------------

We've also been investigating the possibility of enabling Twisted Treeline Ranked Flex in Oceania.

We're going to trial running a single day each week to gauge interest in Ranked TT.  This will tell us if it can sustain high-quality matchmaking and reasonable queue times. To do this, we're going to replace one day of TT Blind Pick with TT Ranked Flex.

We're doing this to understand how we can maximise the availability of the two queues without impacting the quality of the matchmaking or queue times for either.

After a some time we'll decide if we can continue running TT Ranked Flex or not.

Changes being implemented from December 1st:

* TT Ranked Flex will be enabled on Thursday during the hours of 03:00 PM to 01:00 AM AEDT the next day
* TT Normal Blind will no longer be enabled on Thursdays

-------------------------

**TL;DR**

We're changing the following queues from December 1st:

* TT Ranked Flex will be enabled on Thursday during the hours of 03:00 PM to 01:00 AM AEDT the next day
* TT Normal Blind will no longer be enabled on Thursdays

We're changing the following queues from December 2nd:

* SR Ranked Solo/Duo will be disabled daily during the hours of 04:00 AM to 07:00 AM AEDT (Disabled for 3 hours)
* SR Ranked Flex will be disabled daily during the hours of 07:00 AM to 10:00 AM AEDT (Disabled for 3 hours)

replies.body: Fuck oath TT ranked love it. Cant wait to check that shit out cheers lads.

Queue felt like a success?
For me at least queue times actually DROPPED being ranked flex.
For most of the night was in a game within 2 minutes.
HYPE ranked Treeline!!!!
TT RANKED PERMAAAAA

TWISTED TREELINE FLEX

PRAISE RIOT
#make_3v3_ranked_great_again make it availible everyday i find it more fun than normal summoners rift ranked
yay we finally get 3's ranked i missed it since i switched from NA to OCE

Are u adding draft pick at all ? (Sorry if i just didnt see that somewhere) its just i payed 20$ to change my main account from na to oce and now i cant play the 2 game modes i always play, its just sad that i didnt get a warning

Could an announcement have been made in patch notes or in-client earlier regarding this? I only read this after clicking the queue health link in 6.24's patch notes, and have played 2 or 3 games of ranked TT before those notes were released before realising that it was ranked instead of just a new draft mode. Can our placement matches played so far be reverted because there was no announcement made?

Best playlist, so much fun and low queue times. Easy to jump on with a couple friends! Thursday nights is a hard time to get on though, was hoping for a weekend time slot. However, still hoping that this become a full-time thing soon, fingers crossed

Fuck off dummies, removing solo q for 3 hours to force people to play shitty flex. What an absurd solution. Utterly nonsensical. Remove a queue entirely instead of letting it have longer q times or match people with a broader range of elo. Retarded. If nobody plays the game it's a shit game and you should fix the game itself instead of only allowing people to play certain hours so they don't get bored shitless with your shit game.
who tf even plays from 4 am to 7 am
People in WA having a *really* late night
reported for toxic :/
Oh man I can't wait to play 3v3 again I missed it so much.
does flexed rank affect my solo/duo queue rank at all say if I place bronze when in solo/duo I'm gold will it affect my placements next season in solo/duo?
Have me skin riot girle tristana

Yo why do we get 2 queues when we could hardly support 1 for the majority of our existence. We went from having a decent matchmaking pool where 90% of games allowed you to play as your 1st or 2nd role and then we're given 2 queues, one which as far as I'm aware no one cares about and we're told that it's going to be permanent autofill. 

This seems like a massive step backwards.

When I'm told I'm feeding, ruining the game, a troll etc etc. Because I'm trying my best in a role I don't know how to play at the level of skill I am currently placed, that makes me not want to play anymore.

It is effectively forcing me to dodge any games where I'm not given the roles I was able to get to my Elo by playing because it wouldn't be fair on my team or myself to play any other ones.

then play norms in games in those off roles, even if itys just one champ you get a little experience on, there was a time that you didnt always get to pick two roles. we learnthow to play every role to some degree, even if it was just play like a bitch and farm.
I just wanna know when can u change it back as S6
when its after 8am in your time zone but hey you cant play ranked until 7am in a different time zone.. bastards.
Well this is shit twisted treeline is garbage. Bring back ranked team or remove tier restrictions on flex queue
